messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyStereo?
ComfyStereo is a port of the stereoscopic script used in thygate/stable-diffusion-webui-depthmap-script, providing stereoscopic image generation capabilities for ComfyUI.
Who are the contributors to ComfyStereo?
Most of the credit for ComfyStereo goes to the creators of thygate/stable-diffusion-webui-depthmap-script. Additionally, some LLMs have contributed to the development.
What is the Stereo Image Node?
The Stereo Image Node is a basic port from the Automatic1111 stereo script provided by thygate/stable-diffusion-webui-depthmap-script.
The LazyStereo node is a custom stereoscopic image generator created by the author with assistance from LLMs.
Does ComfyStereo support handling of batches?
Yes, both the Stereo Image Node and the LazyStereo node support handling of batches.
What are the potential bugs in ComfyStereo?
It is noted in the documentation that there may be some bugs present in the code.

To install the ComfyStereo nodes, one should clone the repository, ensure all necessary dependencies are installed with `pip install -r requirements.txt`, and then add the nodes folder to the custom_nodes directory of ComfyUI.
